website_summaries.verdict: This long lasting phone does everything right, but lacks some next level features.
pros: Solid camera quality, with an aesthetically pleasing build and very customizable interface
It's software is snappy and the battery life is superb
This looks and feels like a high-end phone
cons: It doesn't have a very high resolution screen, no WiFi calling, and few options for screen and case protection

customer_reviews.title: I am a bit disappointed that it has a low resolution screen and no ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited when I saw that BLU announced this phone. I am a bit disappointed that it has a low resolution screen and no USB-C. However, after receiving it and spending the past few hours getting it setup, it is still an awesome phone. I'll be testing out the cameras this weekend. I am also glad that it uses two SIMs. For those curious, it does force you to choose between using the secondary SIM or an SD card. Luckily, it comes with a 64GB ROM. That is plenty for me. The included case is really slick. I hope some hard shell options become available.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Houston

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Just received this phone 2 days ago and so far it's has impressed me very much. I have owned several blu phones and this one it's so fat the best I ever had. It's fast, snappy, great screen, amazing battery life and awesome camera front and back. I can't belive it lol I know it's a ported phone but I'm glad they did this one cause it works. I git it for $199 but even if I had paid $299 it's still worth it. I'll update more later on as use it more.
customer_reviews.author: Galio

customer_reviews.title: Best battery life hands down
customer_reviews.text: Changing this from three stars to five because it has the best battery life I've ever seen by far. Running graphics intensive games on this, can get 10 hours easy without a charge and without any breaks. Just normal usage should last two or three days without any problem. Everything else is great as well: speed, memory, display, sound, etc... The only negative is the screen shattered on me from a two foot drop. That was the original reason for three stars, but a good protective case should solve that issue. Just be very careful with this if you aren't using a case.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper7112177

customer_reviews.title: Solid phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Upgrading from the Vivo 8 I bought last year there are a few peculiar spec changes (I'm assuming there's a bit of a trade-off in order to keep battery life as good as it is) The screen has lower resolution; (vivo 8: 1080:1920 vivo X: 720:1440), and the the one speaker isn't nearly as loud as the vivo 8 double speaker, but the much faster processor and dual front and back cameras are well worth the trade. I've been doing a lot more gaming on this phone and haven't had any trouble running any of the most demanding games.
customer_reviews.author: Joukai

customer_reviews.title: THE BLU VIVO X IS ABSOLUTELY THE BEST BUDGET PHONE OF THE 2018..!!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS PHONE IS AMAZING, A MUST BUY...IT HAS FOUR CAMERAS A SPEEDY PROCESSOR AND A LONG LASTING BATTERY....I'VE AVERAGED ONE IN A HALF DAYS WITH HEAVY USE WITH NO PROBLEMS. THE 6 INCH SCREEN, SLIM BEZELS AND 18:9 RATIO MAKES THE PHONE LOOK LIKE A NEXT GEN PHONE. THE BELOW FIRING SPEAKER IS LOUDER THAN MY S8..THE ONLY THING HOLDING IT BACK FROM GETTING FIVE STARS IS NO USB-C AND THE 720P SCREEN WHICH IS NICE AND SHARP BUT IT DOES HAVE QUICK CHARGING.
customer_reviews.author: anthony f.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: My main gripe with this phone is the camera app needs an update as it seems to mess up what would be good pictures on this phone with poor software processing. Also the lack of software updates will continue to be th Achilles heel for Blu phones in general. We should at least have Oreo and with the push that Google is making to get more Android phones with up to date software there really isn't an excuse to still be running such old software. Other then that I think this a great phone for the price and I've yet to see a phone that beats this phone with equivalent specs at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Finally a contender.
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. I worked for Big Red for almost a decade and have seen a ton of phones come and go.... I have to say this is one of the best one's that I've used in a long time. It's rather quick, split screen is wonderful and when I use my slingbox on it to watch tv, the picture is great. I've had great reception in area's where I didn't have as much luck with prior phones. I do agree with others that the case is a bit ugly but it was free so I can't complain too much. Well worth 249.99 or even the 300 when it goes up in price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Occasionally decides to not update sms for 20-60 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for about 8 months and now I'm looking for a new one. The GPS works fine, and things seemed to work. About a month in, I realized that the timer and alarms are always off by a few minutes. No big deal. About 3 months ago, I find that text messages aren't getting updated for extended periods of time, then arriving in clumps. It's not a question of bars either. This makes conversations virtually impossible. After a factory reset, everything seemed to work reasonably for about a week. Then they went back to being delayed. I am incredibly disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Platon Lukyanenko

customer_reviews.title: Blu phones are great! This Vivo X is very smooth operation and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very trustworthy seller, Fast Shipping with Prime. Blu phones are great! This Vivo X is very smooth operation and great features. Thank you Blu for another great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Goins

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding phone! way better value and quality then overpriced flagship phones including Apple products, WAY TO GO BLU!
customer_reviews.text: Having worked in Retail mobile shops I honestly don't understand how Blu can offer such amazing value, By far one of the best phones out there. You won't believe how fast and how responsive the Vivo X is. You won't believe the quality they offer at such a good price. If your looking for a phone that has a great camera, Loud Speakers, and outstanding battery life to which even Apple can't even compete offers 4010MAH were the latest Iphone is 2716 lol, it's clear which phone offers more value and better quality then most overpriced flagship devices, overall very solid phone THANKS BLU!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Total disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone a few months ago and I feel dupped. Love the battery life, screen quality's not bad either but the phone itself is the problem. Wether in the middle of a call or using an app, it just cuts everything off and you'll have to redial again or start everything over. It's come to the point where I'm embarrassed because for important calls I wish I was home so I can use the home phone. Before I forget this phone won't read the memory card after a few weeks no matter how many times you change it or brands you buy for it. All this when it's not even a year since I got it
customer_reviews.author: Stellina

customer_reviews.title: Love the phone. Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the price. I initially had some problems with connecting to my car system via Bluetooth which I didn't have with my previous BLU phone. Discovered it was actually a problem in the Nougat Android software edition on the phone. To fix my problem I set the passcode in my car system to 0000.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff in WI

customer_reviews.title: Relation price/quality
customer_reviews.text: Excelent mobile. Very good camera. There are several things that BLU will have to change in the near future: USB type C it's a must right now. Also, a resolution of 720p it's not enough. And the last thing, being release on Feb 2018, how is it possible it doesn't come with Android 8? Anyway, it's a cool phone, big display, very nice camera and very good and big battery (in terms of capacity).
customer_reviews.author: Ignacio Ariznabarreta

customer_reviews.title: Good solid device!
customer_reviews.text: I got this phone back in the end of March and I really enjoy it. It's quick to open and load apps and quick browsing the web. It does take some really good pictures but they aren't very detailed like more expensive phone cameras. I wish it had more accessories to buy and I also wish the screen wasn't so bright even when turned down. One feature I wish it had was night mode to reduce the blue light at night. It's a good phone for the price. Great sound during a call and a nice loud speaker for music or TV watching. Definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a solid quality smart phone without the hefty price tag.
customer_reviews.author: A.H.

customer_reviews.title: Good phone and hardware
customer_reviews.text: Good phone and hardware. It's subjective whether or not the phone just feels right and this one didn't feel right for me. Eventually I went with the Essential Phone PH-1 and am in love.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Good phone. Good specs. I switched it out for the vivo 8 because of better resolution and processor
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Wojciehowski

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone! :-)))
customer_reviews.text: This phone is superb! This is the first time that I have purchased a Blu phone and I don't regret it. I wanted a budget phone could do most things that the latest brand phones can do, but also compatible with cricket mobile. These guys have awesome customer service also!
customer_reviews.author: Kemor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this phone! The colors and quality of the screen are amazing. I have dropped it several times and no cracks thanks to the gorrila glass. It charges super fast and the battery lasts for a long time! At the price, it beats Samsung by a long shot!
customer_reviews.author: Heather E

customer_reviews.title: This BLU VIVO X is a great phone. Big Screen
customer_reviews.text: This BLU VIVO X is a great phone. Big Screen, Long Battery Life. I have had no issues at all. I'm using Cricket Wireless and it works great. This is a good phone and it even comes with a case. Quick service and delivery. Very Satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Collins

customer_reviews.title: This thing is AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AMAZING!!!!! I bought as a gift for my father and let me tell you i have been an avid Iphone user since the beginning and i WILL be switching to this phone when time comes. All the specs on this phone are pretty much what the iPhone X for $1000 less!!! Only downside is at the time I bought it there wasnt a lot of phone case options
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Padaoan

customer_reviews.title: Great phone but, digitizer, Ehh..
customer_reviews.text: The digitizer glass isn't really that good. Had it in my front pocket and bumped it against the car door when I was getting out of the car.. Ahh.. Cracked the top corner of the phone?! Though it's not in sight, it has been down hill from there. Going to need a replacement digitizer soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Phillips

customer_reviews.title: No replacement glass. Easy to break screen.
customer_reviews.text: Cracked in one drop. No replacement glass available. The least durable phone I've ever had. Only lasted for a few months. It takes good pictures though.
customer_reviews.author: purplerose

customer_reviews.title: B L U ! ! !
customer_reviews.text: Never heard of BLU before .. BUT .. probably never go back to MOTO again .. the price for what you get is like nothing else on the market .. VERY PLEASED ! His and Hers !
customer_reviews.author: William R Naggy Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great features & performance.
customer_reviews.text: I've had several BLU phones over the years and all have performed better than expected. The VivoX is no exception. This phone has real flagship performance & features at budget pricing. The battery life is amazing. I bought this on sale for $199 and couldn't be more satisfied. If you want champagne on a beer budget, this is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A really good phone and a fair price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this phone the performance is good the cameras are good and the 6 inch screen is big enough and sharp enough. The only reason I don't give it 5 Stars just because I know yes there are some super high-end phones out there that cost 8 or $900 that have a sharper screen and even faster performance but this is more than adequate.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: The cell phone is fast and with good capacity. It has good finish in general and ...
customer_reviews.text: The cell phone is fast and with good capacity. It has good finish in general and the included case is nice. I only give it four stars because they reduced the quality of the accessories a lot, the headset in particular, and it does not have a Fast Charge like the VIVO 8. To improve ...
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: I would have to say this is the best Blu I have bought in a couple of years
customer_reviews.text: I would have to say this is the best Blu I have bought in a couple of years. I would recommend it to anyone who is looking for a good phone that is priced right.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Criniti

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone for anyone trying to figure out the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone for anyone trying to figure out the face lock it's in settings under security under smart Lock. I had to call to find it . It's a nice feature but it unlocked with my eyes closed so not too secure
customer_reviews.author: aphla5

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is awesome. It is now more compatible with Play Store ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had Samsung phones especially the Note and it definitely is a winner. It charges faster than the previous Blu phones I've had. Battery life is awesome. It is now more compatible with Play Store apps. Strongly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Luis Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Very nice design perfect phone for this value the screen has ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design perfect phone for this value the screen has beutifull color sound is ok camera works absolutely perfect for my opinion this is the best phone on the market for this price
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Long battery life - goes 2 days easily with regular use
customer_reviews.text: Long battery life - goes 2 days easily with regular use.) Bright screen. Comes with screen protector attached. Camera takes good pictures... and comparable to mid-range phones. I have used the phone for 2 months now and overall I'm happy with the stability and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good phone that functions very well
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good phone that functions very well. However, the only reason why I didn't give it a five-star rating is because of the fact that the phone does not have Wi-Fi calling option. If it did have Wi-Fi calling, this phone would be one of the very best phones available.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best BLU phone yet!! Fast, great display, easy to use!! Sound quality and speakers are great!
customer_reviews.author: young Diva

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, Great seller
customer_reviews.text: Just got my phone today. So far so good! It is as described by the seller, Open group wireless. The seller sent a business/support card in case of any problems, which I appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: Arleshia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only con I can think of is that this phone doesn't have the ultra fast charging feature.☹️
customer_reviews.author: SuperAudit

customer_reviews.title: The quad cameras are definitely an eye catcher but not ...
customer_reviews.text: The quad cameras are definitely an eye catcher but not as much as the price. The quality all around meets expectations for any smartphone lover. Ready to use out the box. Just pop in your sim. Setup the phone (like any other new smartphone). Then it's ready to use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Butler

customer_reviews.title: Great features
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, received today. Very easy to set up and navigate. Not too heavy or light in your hands. Very impressed with the latest features it had. No problem with the fingerprint security. Love love. This is my 3rd Blu phone and I've never been disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Laney Messina

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for Price
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this phone, I went from Blu Vivo 5 to Vivo 5R, to this. This great everything, Great Camera, great size, great display (looks better than full HD screen the Vivo 5R has), great performance due to it's specs, great sound and i got great price ($199).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... about this phone at first but I am in love with it now
customer_reviews.text: Little skeptical about this phone at first but I am in love with it now. The battery life is amazing and I love how quick I am able to search for anything. I would highly recommend it to anyone in the market for a new phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just a great phone!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone for the price. I was in need of a phone and this helped out a lot. It has great camera, great color and the size of the screen is just right to watch videos, use with navigation apps and more. I would definitely recommend you to buy it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome phone/ need more phone cases
customer_reviews.text: Great phone just switched to Android got sick of apple this phone is comparable to the iPhone X solid product for the price point can't lose. The camera is amazing wish they had more phone cases
customer_reviews.author: George Goodine

customer_reviews.title: blu is a fantastic brand, several of my friends and acquaintances use ...
customer_reviews.text: blu is a fantastic brand, several of my friends and acquaintances use blu for my recommendation and are very satisfied, price and excellent quality, I invite you to earn real money online in Spanish CPA libertydg.com
customer_reviews.author: Diego Luis Labrousse

customer_reviews.title: please note that display is not as good as other premium phones
customer_reviews.text: As for the entry level phone, I can't complain. Battery last very long and design is very sleek. However, please note that display is not as good as other premium phones, but it is good enough watch movies.
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: Samsung who?
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone. Love the fingerprint reader and the face recognition unlock is so fast. Speaker is plenty loud too. What a deal for $250!
customer_reviews.author: H20guy

customer_reviews.title: This phone is cost friendly
customer_reviews.text: This phone is awesome the battery chargers fast and the size of the phone is perfect for watching videos
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Phone at A Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone. Bought this for my mother-in-law. Very easy to use and a big screen. Works flawlessly. Connected to AT&T network.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice size and video quality & great price point...but I dropped it in the water... gotta buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone and awesome sellers!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so this phone is awesome!!!! Received it yesterday. It works just fine with straight talk. The sellers got phone to me super fast. I got the perfect phone without the huge price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Latesha Cleary

customer_reviews.title: And I have found that the reception is real good with all the cellular bands that this phone has
customer_reviews.text: I am most interested in reception than the bells and whistles. And I have found that the reception is real good with all the cellular bands that this phone has.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to S8.for far less.
customer_reviews.text: Far exceeds all expectations for a phone in this price point. Good crisp cameras. Excellent sound. Only gripe is a 1 second delay on Play Music.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tew

customer_reviews.title: Just cut off the blu pop up adds, and it's smooth sailing from there
customer_reviews.text: Phone is everything I needed in a phone, camera is A+ and memory. Screen is nice size. Has the feel of a expensive phone without the price. Highly recommend this phone
customer_reviews.author: Nehisi Ahhah Djedefre

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful smartphone !
customer_reviews.text: Just wonderful phone...I mean smartphone ! 4 good cameras, long lasting battery, nice sound quality, 64GB memory (huge), 4GB RAM, 2.4 GHz processor (reasonably fast), 6" screen, finger print & face recognition security system and comperatively low price - just wonderful !!
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad A. Rahman

customer_reviews.title: FaceID love it
customer_reviews.text: Best phone ever, buying iPhone or samsung it’s waisted money
customer_reviews.author: Enis O.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing upgrade
customer_reviews.text: It's an amazing upgrade from the last phone. I love all the new improvements. Definitely feel like I get more than what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: sylvia

customer_reviews.title: camera is great.
customer_reviews.text: system need improve, battery power goes down fast after one month. camera is great .
customer_reviews.author: Royao

customer_reviews.title: It's one of the best phone that I have ever had, but it could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Annoying and using the slide screen make the phone unable to lock safe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: My wife has had this phone for a week now and loves it! A huge upgrade from the Blu Pure XL.
customer_reviews.author: B-Funkel

customer_reviews.title: Great phone at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone for my husband. He said it is awesome and he loves it! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Bernice Shaver

customer_reviews.title: Great phone! Blu does an amazing job creating inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! Blu does an amazing job creating inexpensive, quality phones. The Blu Vivo X Quad cameras are a cool upgrade comparing it to the Vivo XL2.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice phone for the price takes very good pictures
customer_reviews.author: minecraft is good can,t what for 0.7.0 update

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best blu i seen so far every thing on point
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas brown

customer_reviews.title: Very well priced!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is great it has everything big name phone has and MORE !!! Facial recognition,finger print I'd and duo cameras
customer_reviews.author: trell969

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with Verizon Sim card for some reason
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful phone. Fantastic picture quality. Wish the speaker phone function was clearer but best phone I've owned
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome phone for the price, very fast, camera takes good pictures, this phone is every bit as good as the flagships from the major carriers.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew York

customer_reviews.title: Overall good phone but no wide angle in rear camera
customer_reviews.text: Overall good phone. Sound and color quality is good. Battery life is almost 3 days with normal use but not charging fast enough. Phone is sleek but little heavy and larger size. Liked dual sim feature. Camera is OK. Could be better if Rear camera also has wide angle feature. Liked back light setting. Music app that comes with phone doesn't have manual setting to change sound quality. Could have provided separate slots for the dual sim and micro sd, like in earlier models. However performance of the device is good.
customer_reviews.author: sring

customer_reviews.title: Very good smartphone
customer_reviews.text: Very good smartphone, it's the best battery, not need changer all day.
customer_reviews.author: Heber Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and works with Fitbit.
customer_reviews.text: I was lucky enough to get this phone during the $199 introductory period. It was a cinch to setup with Cricket. I just took the sim card out of my old iphone and it worked right away. All of my apps installed easily too. I was pleasantly surprised to find that my Fitbit Charge 2 was actually syncing with it and getting text & phone call notifications from my phone. All in all it's a great phone and the price can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: BelleBty

customer_reviews.title: It had so much potential to be a great budget phone
customer_reviews.text: It had so much potential to be a great budget phone. However, I guess I got a "lemon". Mine just randomly rebooted several times a day. After about 15 days of that, I had to send mine back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Grady Ford

customer_reviews.title: The phone works fine, but suddenly it updated on its own
customer_reviews.text: The phone works fine, but suddenly it updated on its own, and it installed an ad application that makes the phone barely usable. I checked online and apparently this is a very common issue on BLU phones. I am trying to see if i can return it to Amazon since I've only had it for a month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay connected to WiFi and Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.text: Like the phone, but has a problem staying connected to WiFi and Bluetooth. Have to reboot to reconnect every other day or so. Heard it’s a common bug, but super annoying! Would have given more stars if not for this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Cards Fan 4

customer_reviews.title: is thin and comfortable in the hand
customer_reviews.text: This phone does exactly what the description says. It takes Ok pictures, is thin and comfortable in the hand, and is relatively easy to use. However, the processor speed and user interface, are not up to par with a Snapdragon or Galaxy S. I thought it would be a good idea to upgrade my Galaxy S7 to the VIVO X. I was not impressed. The system response was slower than what I'm used to and the UI just feels "cheap" to me. On a brighter note, the front camera was awesome for using Google Duo to talk to my son while I'm on the road. Its not a bad phone, I just feel like my S7 is a better phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Sanford

customer_reviews.title: I am so in love with this phone
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with this phone. I love the size, split screen, the camera, the Emojis...OMG...I love everything about this phone. It's better than any i-phone.
customer_reviews.author: Reshana

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great budget phone. Laggy but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Joseph L Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great phone value . has most of the flagship features
customer_reviews.author: Barry Van De Carr

customer_reviews.title: This was the worst and most expensive phone
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst and most expensive phone. The phone still doesn't work after 2 different service providers. When you call the manufacturer Blu about there product they act as though you are totally clueless. NEVER Again! If I didn't have to give one star you would get No stars for me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Slusher

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Received this phone yesterday and it was not a dual sim. 🙁😠
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Buttons close and on same side. Volume button keeps getting turned down.
customer_reviews.text: Forgot and once again bought a Blu and once again...same issue. The off on button is on the same side as the volume buttons and too damn close together. Just taking the phone out of my pocket or returning it causes you to hit the buttons without realizing your turning the volume down. Already missing phone calls and it's just a few day old. Do yourself a favor.. Ensure the buttons are NOT on the same side...
customer_reviews.author: Steven Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Phone gets lines going through the lock screen as if it were smashed, but it's a manufacturer defect.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Screen cracked first drop!
customer_reviews.text: So I've had my new phone literally for like 2 weeks - decided to splurge a little on myself (my $ usually goea to things for my kids) - I really liked the phone (my 2nd BLU phone).... but what do I do this weekend?! Dropped my phone once and the screen cracked! I had my other one for like 3 years and didn't even have one scratch on it! So pissed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The camera sucks. Just buy the Vivo 8. It's so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe García

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok phone. It keeps going up sleep mode in less than 30 seconds. Trying to troubleshoot it but not making progress. Also Not compatible to my Samsung gear 2 watch. Big bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Baez

customer_reviews.title: Great phone at unbelievable price
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Blu phone. I have finished setting up this phone and am really impressed! I was a little concerned after reading some reviews that said there was no quick access menu. This was false. I'm guessing that Blu fixed an issue that was in the test phones. Anyway, this device is fast, has lots of storage, a good amount of RAM, and a price that can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: R. Porter

customer_reviews.title: A remarkable phone with an even more remarkable price
customer_reviews.text: Eureka! I finally found the perfect phone for myself!! This is an amazing phone, very fast CPU, more than enough RAM, plenty of storage that is expandable, dual SIM card. Nice sturdy aluminum case, incredible cameras I have not possibly found anything I don't love about this phone especially the price!! BLU is now the only phone I will buy!! I did see a couple of reviews criticizing it's lack of a USB-C charge cable. This was quickly remedied by using my already purchased Tronsmart micro USB 20awg Lightning Cables with gold plated ends!! It charges this phone remarkably fast!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was a great phone.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third BLU phone. I bought this VIVO-X phone in August 2018. All was great until 20 January 2019. All the sudden the phone slowed down to a crawl, screens started opening and closing. When phone comes out of sleep mode it's a delayed reaction for everything you do. I have rebooted the phone several times now, but no improvemet. I've sent two messages to BLU technical support, but no response. Your experience might be diffirent than mine. So if you buy it be prepared to replace it in six months or less. Good luck with your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BBIG

customer_reviews.title: BLU Vivo X Smartphone
customer_reviews.text: This really is a flagship phone from BLU. Comes with charger, screen protector and gel case. Great pictures and videos. Nice size screen, great storage 64GB. I am not a gamer, so phones memory 4GB and speed are great for video feeds, downloads and everyday use. Feels great in hand, good quality. Sound is awesome. I have had BLU phones before, as well as earlier LG and Samsung models, this one really tops them.
customer_reviews.author: John G

customer_reviews.title: Very bad customer connection and phone
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointing the first two Blu phones I bought I loved and was very satisfied this phone from day one gave me nothing but problems and the watch I got to go with it same issues. It has turned me off to Blu company, I tried to reach out to Blu thinking maybe I had factory defective phone but never could get ahold of anyone or get anything resolved. The phone gets hot and shuts down, apps delete or turn on randomly, the screen from day one you really have to push it hard and several times for it to sense you touching it, just nothing but problems.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher H.

customer_reviews.title: Used for 10 Months now.
customer_reviews.text: The specs on this phone are excellent and was a very good phone until my one year old threw it and broke the glass on the screen even with the supplied bumper cover it had. The reason for the 4 stars was the camera in average to dim light doesn't look great. Doesn't take great pics in normal to dim light but excellent in bright light outside! After owning a Samsung Galaxy for many years I decided to go back to Samsung Galaxy after my son shattered the glass because of the camera quality.
customer_reviews.author: Coop

customer_reviews.title: Hidden Gem
customer_reviews.text: Hi all, I'm Blu phone user. I'm currently on the vivo 10+I which is simply brilliant. The vivo 10 doesn't fall behind. At first use you can feel is awesome sleek design and beautiful 6 inch vibrant screen. As far as the mechanics few upgrades from vivo 8 in essence it feels like a vivo 8+ if they had one. I would get it and recommend it. Excellence meets affordability. Ciao
customer_reviews.author: KingRey

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. Great charge. Weak screen.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this phone. Works just like an expensive Android. Took incredible pictures and video, and charge lasted the full day and sometimes more if not used extensively. Be aware the screen is super delicate so get a screen protector! I only had it for a short while before I cracked the screen, definitely not gorilla glass. But amazing phone.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: Bad charging experience
customer_reviews.text: For some reason my phone isn't charging ... Sometimes ... Sometimes it will but then I go for 2 days where it won't charge ... Bought it new April 2018 ... Started not charging in December was ok now her end if January won't charge. Then it did ... But after I bought a new phone.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone for Quality and Price!
customer_reviews.text: After trying many different phones (all more expensive) I am most happy with this one. Great sound quality, long battery life, fast charging... And I've dropped it a hundred times with no damage! I've had Blu before and I have no idea why I would even try anything else. Maybe because you sometimes feel that if it costs more, it's better quality? Not true!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very good value Dual sims
customer_reviews.text: Great phone long battery life. And the pictures are. Very good. This phone is very good. Value I am. Using with a dual Sim. With different Carriers. This phone has held up well with 2 cards I also used this. International in China with. Sim card from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Scott D

customer_reviews.title: Second  BLU  phone that I have bought. I've had no problems with the first one until I dropped it and busted the screen
customer_reviews.text: It's an Android large enough I can see and read my Kindle books also on internet it's big enough for you to see more than one thing at one time
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Second time owner of a BLU phone. Marvelous. I don't miss my Samsung at all. Works perfectly with Cricket.
customer_reviews.author: mhg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent battery life
customer_reviews.text: Phone is quick and responsive. I haven't noticed any lag. No NFC but not a deal breaker for me. Came with a few anoying BLU bloatapps that i was able to disable. Good screen size and the phone doesn't feel big not heavy. At a moderate use the battery lasts me 2 days
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone but the screen did crack on the second ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone but the screen did crack on the second drop. I love this phone too much to complain though
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: No better value in smart phones
customer_reviews.text: No better value in smart phones. I wish they would just apply the screen protector or include some sore of template to apply the screen protector. This is my third BLU phone and not one has ever had the screen protector applied properly.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Wossner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the money you pay
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for the money you pay, excellent in general, very happy with it. I bought it in 2017 and this review is from December 2019.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone. It's so much faster than my last phone which allows me to work faster and get more done. I'll definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... wrong works extremely well with my cricket service the best 250 I've spent on a phone ever 💯
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't go wrong works extremely well with my cricket service the best 250 I've spent on a phone ever 💯
customer_reviews.author: Edward Alonzo

product_meta.title: BLU VIVO X – 6.0” HD+18:9 Display Smartphone with Dual Front and Rear Cameras –Black
product_meta.description: The vivo x was designed with an Ultra narrow bezel to Exhibit a graceful curved bodyline and enhanced the end to screen ratio. This design concept provides both unique conform and design balance unlike any other smartphone.
feature_bullets: 6.0 HD+ 18:9 Widescreen with Corning Gorilla Glass 3 Curved Display
Advance Quad cameras: Dual rear cameras - 13MP + 5MP with flash, Dual front selfie Camera - 20MP Sony IMX376+ 8MP 120 degree wide angle with flash
64GB Internal memory 4GB RAM Micro SD up to 64GB; Mediatek Helio P25 2.6GHz Octa core processor
4,010mAh Battery with 5V/2A Quick Charger and Fingerprint Sensor
4G LTE, (1/2/3/4/5/7/8/12/17/28), 3G HSPA+ (850/900/1700/1900/2100): US compatibility Nationwide on all GSM Networks including AT&T, T-Mobile, Cricket, MetroPCS, Straight Talk, and others.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars240 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
